body.name: BETU Cooling Pillow Shredded Memory Foam Pillow Queen Size for Hot Sleepers, Bamboo Adjustable Bed Pillows Perfect for Back Pain, Neck & Side Sleepers, Cooling Gel CertiPUR-US Memory Foam,1 Pack

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: PREMIUM COOLING GEL FABRIC: The cooling pillow is made of tailor-made cooling gel fabric that have undergone long-term research and upgrading. This side sleeper pillow can reduce your heat in few minutes. In summer, it will allow you to have a cool night, and a refreshing, comfortable dry morning without any stickiness! There's nothing better than having a cool night on a hot day! Right, huh?

NOT JUST SOFT: Our unique shredded memory foam pillow is a revolutionary hybrid designed to provide you with the sweet feeling of down and the solid support of memory foam. The perfect balance will keep your spine in line so that can help you to relax your cervical spine.

DOUBLE-SIDE DESIGNED: The COOLING side is made of our cooling gel fabric which is usually used in hot days. The one side is made of viscous rayon that is a kind of breathable, supple, cozy material and suitable for some cold days. In short, our BETU pillow fits all seasons use, what you need to do is just turning it over when you feel hot or cold. One bed pillow for both purposes!

LOFT ADJUSTABLE: Our shredded pillows are designed for users in different sleeping positions. Each firm pillow comes with an extra pack of fillers, so that you can adjust the height of the pillow according to your sleeping position, just by changing the amount of filler. 100% fill for side sleepers, 75% fill for back sleepers and 50% fill for stomach sleepers. Any sleeping position you want can be easily satisfied.

BUY IT WITH NO WORRIES: When you open the package, please give it 6-12 hours to fluff up and put it in a ventilated area to let the smell dissipate. Also, this pillow is easy to clean, the bed pillow is removable and machine washable (don't wash the insert so it won't fluff up anymore). Please avoid drying the pillowcase in the dryer to prevent the cool feeling material from being damaged. All materials are chemically untreated for user convenience and are CertiPUR certified for safety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cool
reviews.reviewText: Really good quality, just as described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Possibly the most comfortable pillow I've ever had!
reviews.reviewText: As someone who sleeps on their side or stomach, this pillow is great because of the customization of filler. Because of my preferred sleep positions, fluffy large pillows don't work for me. With this one you can easily unzip the pillow and take out or add as much filler as you like, as it does come with extra. I didn't need the extra filling, i took out nearly half and made it into the exact pillow i needed. Whats also nice is encasement itself on the outside is very comfy, soft, and has two sides bamboo and cooling. I have no idea whats in the cooling side but it sometimes feels straight up cold when i flip it over! Also great for those of us who sleep hot. I'm very happy with it and highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good shredded foam pillow value
reviews.reviewText: I have a Coop Home Good Pillow that I love and the BETU is an excellent knock-off. It has a secondary casing that is very soft and breathable. It comes with extra foam if you want to make it firmer. However, I found that the existing foam is far more than I needed and removed some. I ran it through a couple of "freshen up" cycles in the dryer and that knocked out 80% of the foam order with the rest dissipating in a few days. I think it offers great support and comfort for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars just go and get it
reviews.reviewText: the cool side is actually cool. its just amount of nice and soft. adjustable to , my liking. best pillow i have ever baught in my life

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars soft for the short while
reviews.reviewText: when i gotten the pillow it was nice and soft and it felt good though after having it for a while it started to need to be fluffed or something like that, and the pillow cover started doing that pilling thing, so its no longer smooth. I mean its good since my head didn't feel too hot or cold just about right and it was comfortable for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is so comfortable and they include an extra pack of filling even though you probably won't need it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, a pillow I like!
reviews.reviewText: I love this pillow, especially because you can remove filling to adjust it to your liking. It also comes with extra filling if you need more. I removed some filling to get the desired firmness I wanted. If you are looking for a replacement for a my pillow type product, this is it!
